Chennai.intro: Where ancient Dravidian shrines stand beside a roaring ocean and colonial avenues — spirituality in a modern metropolis.

temples.name: Kapaleeshwarar Temple
temples.significance: Built by Pallavas; famous for divine peacock legend and Dravidian gopuram.

temples.name: Parthasarathy Temple
temples.significance: Oldest known Krishna temple; deity appears with conch marks and moustache.

temples.name: Ashtalakshmi Temple
temples.significance: Eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi worshipped in one sacred complex by the sea.

Kanchipuram.intro: City of a thousand temples — philosophical capital of the Pallavas and seat of Sri Kamakoti Peetam.

temples.name: Ekambareswarar Temple
temples.significance: Sacred mango tree believed to be 3,500 years old; Pallava origin.

temples.name: Kamakshi Amman Temple
temples.significance: Goddess seated posture represents supreme grace and compassion.

temples.name: Varadaraja Perumal Temple
temples.significance: Golden lizard shrine; major Vishnu Kshetram.

Thanjavur.intro: Imperial Chola heartland — where granite rose like mountain peaks to honour the divine.

temples.name: Brihadeeswarar Temple
temples.significance: Rajaraja Chola’s masterpiece — the Great Living Chola Temple.

temples.name: Gangaikonda Cholapuram
temples.significance: Rajendra Chola’s sacred capital — refined sculpture and elegance.

Kumbakonam.intro: Temple town of nectar — sacred rivers, teerthams, and the Mahamaham cosmic festival center.

temples.name: Adi Kumbeshwarar Temple
temples.significance: Origin of Kumbakonam — Shiva shaped from nectar pot.

temples.name: Sarangapani Temple
temples.significance: Largest Vishnu temple in South India after Srirangam.

temples.name: Airavatesvara Temple (Darasuram)
temples.significance: Musical steps and chariot-shaped mandapa — sculptural excellence.

temples.name: Mahamaham Tank
temples.significance: Southern Kumbh — holy dip every 12 years removes karmic layers.

Tiruvannamalai.intro: Mountain of fire — spiritual axis of Advaita and home of thiruvannamalai deepam.

temples.name: Arunachaleswarar Temple
temples.significance: Arunachala hill itself revered as Shiva; Giri Pradakshina sacred walk.

Madurai.intro: Lotus-shaped cultural capital — Sangam age heritage and divine marriage legend.

temples.name: Meenakshi Amman Temple
temples.significance: Temple city model — divine wedding of Meenakshi & Sundareshwarar.

Palani.intro: Sacred hill of renunciation — where Murugan revealed the fruit of wisdom.

temples.name: Palani Murugan Temple
temples.significance: Dandayudhapani — renunciation, Siddhar tradition, Panchamirtham prasadam.

Chidambaram.intro: Cosmic stage of consciousness — Nataraja’s dance of creation and silence.

temples.name: Nataraja Temple
temples.significance: Chidambara Rahasya — formless truth behind golden veil.

Rameswaram.intro: Bridge of devotion — where Rama worshipped Shiva and oceans purify pilgrims.

temples.name: Ramanathaswamy Temple
temples.significance: Sacred wells, longest temple corridor in India — gateway to moksha.
